description:
EndeavourOS Mercury is now available for download with Linux kernel 6.13, Xfce 4.20, and KDE Plasma 6.2.5. Here's what's new!

The post Arch Linux-Based EndeavourOS Mercury Lands with Linux Kernel 6.13 and Xfce 4.20 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Arch Linux-Based EndeavourOS Mercury Lands with Linux Kernel 6.13 and Xfce 4.20
